description: This file defines a Java interface 'BatteryBackedUp' that extends another interface 'BatteryPowered'. It declares methods related to power backup states such as AC power loss, battery health, and battery presence, representing a device capability in the system.

classes.name: BatteryBackedUp
classes.description: Java interface defining power backup capabilities for a device, including power loss and battery status indicators.

methods.name: isACPowerLost
methods.description: Checks if the device has lost AC power.

methods.name: setACPowerLost
methods.description: Sets the AC power lost status on the device.

methods.name: isBatteryBad
methods.description: Checks if the device's battery health is bad.

methods.name: isBatteryMissing
methods.description: Checks if the battery is missing.
